sentences.en: A flight of green parrots shot out of the cedar forest.
sentences.cn: 一群绿鹦鹉从杉木林里疾速飞出。

sentences.en: European Spruce and Maple for musical instruments. Red Cedar tops, Mahogany, Zebrawood and many more.
sentences.cn: 制作乐器的欧洲云杉和枫木, 上等红雪松, 桃花心木, 热带美洲产木材等等.

sentences.en: Every piece of timber was planed, cut to size and stained with cedar preservative.
sentences.cn: 每根木材都被刨平了，切割成一定尺寸，并涂上了雪松防腐剂。

sentences.en: He saw her sitting under a large cedar tree in the garden.
sentences.cn: 他看到她坐在花园里一棵很大的雪松树下.

sentences.en: I can hardly believe it's been over eight years since you used to go camping at Cedar Creek.
sentences.cn: 我几乎无法相信现在距离你过去常常去松溪露营的日子已经有8年多了。

sentences.en: It makes the little cedar trees quiver, as with delight.
sentences.cn: 它能让小雪松们高兴得颤抖.

sentences.en: Prepare to stand down sectors Redwood, Douglas, Cedar and Mistletoe.
sentences.cn: 各部门准备离开.红木 、 道格拉斯 、 雪松、和槲寄生.

sentences.en: Soft tannins combined with cedar, berry fruits, chocolate and blackcurrant.
sentences.cn: 丹宁柔和,充满橡木, 梅子果实, 巧克力和黑醋栗味道.

sentences.en: The bird perched on a cedar by the window.
sentences.cn: 鸟栖息在窗前的杉树上.

sentences.en: The box is made out of cedar wood.
The cedar was about five feet high and very shapely.
sentences.cn: 那棵雪松约有五尺高,风姿优美.

sentences.en: The most common construction woods are Douglas fir, hemlock, spruce, pine, and some cedar.
sentences.cn: 最常用的木料是道格拉斯冷杉, 铁杉, 云杉, 松木以及其他一些杉木.

sentences.en: The pine, cedar and spruce are evergreens.
sentences.cn: 松树 、 雪松、云杉都是常绿的树.

sentences.en: The yacht is built of cedar strip planking.
sentences.cn: 游艇是用雪松木条建造的。

sentences.en: Whatever the cost, she was going out to Cedar Bridge.
sentences.cn: 不管付出什么代价, 她就是要到杉树桥去.

phrases.tran_cn: 锡达拉皮兹市（美国城市）

trans.tran_en: a large  evergreen  tree with leaves shaped like needles
